SEARCH
Package com.nickslibrary.datastructures.heaps

Class FibonacciHeap<T extends Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.nickslibrary.datastructures.heaps.FibonacciHeap<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of elements in the Fibonacci Heap, which must be comparable.
public class FibonacciHeap<T extends Comparable<T>> extends Object
A Fibonacci Heap is a data structure that consists of a collection of heap-ordered trees. It supports efficient operations for merging heaps and extracting the minimum element.

    • extractMin

      public T extractMin()
      Extracts and returns the minimum element from the Fibonacci Heap.
      Returns:
      The minimum element in the heap.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the heap is empty.

    • peekMin

      public T peekMin()
      Returns the minimum element without removing it.
      Returns:
      The minimum element in the heap.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the heap is empty.

    • decreaseKey

      public void decreaseKey(FibonacciHeap.Node<T> node, T newKey)
      Decreases the key of a node in the Fibonacci Heap.
      Parameters:
      node - The node whose key should be decreased.
      newKey - The new value for the key.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if newKey is greater than the current key.
